title: Gran Turismo 5 Screensaver
description:
Download and Enjoy Gran Turismo 5 Screensaver





Start your engines, Gran Turismo 5, the real driving simulation is in your desktop screen.


Image Preview:

 <a href="
http://www.winthemepack.com/img/Preview/Gran_Turismo_5/Gran_Turismo_Preview_1.jpg" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.winthemepack.com/img/Preview/Gran_Turismo_5/Gran_Turismo_Preview_1.jpg</a>

 <a href="
http://www.winthemepack.com/img/Preview/Gran_Turismo_5/Gran_Turismo_Preview_2.jpg" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.winthemepack.com/img/Preview/Gran_Turismo_5/Gran_Turismo_Preview_2.jpg</a>



Features:

You can:
Change the seconds of the image duration.
Change the item order to Sequential, Random or Shuffle.
Resize the images to Fit Screen, Resize to Fill Screen, Stretch, etc.
Add/Remove the transitions effects and the speed.
Use your own playlist.
Control the Exit Conditions, on Mouse move, Mouse Button Click, Keyboard Button, ESC Button.
Hide/Show the clock.

Up to 83 Gran Turismo 5 High Quality Images (HQ)
Multi Monitor Support
Press F2 to set the active image as Wallpaper
Amazing Slide Show and effects.



==================================================================

OS: Windows 8, 7, Vista, 2003, XP, 2000, 98, Me, NT


Howto Install Screensavers/Animated Wallpapers On Windows Vista / 7 / 8
Right-click in the program installer, and then click Run As Administrator


Enjoy!
